description: This file defines a wrapper function for a logging module, importing external logging functionality and providing a create function to instantiate logs with specified verbosity and warning settings.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Log object from the external ProxyStubGenerator.Log module, with optional verbosity and warning display settings.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
